Articles.Content:
There is this really cool game called "voar" which is like asteroids, kessler syndrome, and a 2d version of KSP combined. It can be played here: http://voar.io/

Game Instructions

To play the game, you only need to use the left mouse button. Every time you click, it send you a little more prograde. Its like a tiny burst of delta-v every time you click. You'll get the hang of it pretty quickly.

The point of this game is to take a screenshot of your highest score on Voar. (when you crash, your score is still displayed on the bottom, hit "print screen" to take a screenshot)

Post your screenshot here, and I will keep a leaderboard on this post. There isn't really a way to prove that you actually took the screenshot though, as your name isn't displayed on screen. If you wanna prove it was you, have another tab open in your browser with the KSP forums in it. That would help a lot.

Please remember that this is a friendly competition, so no rampant bragging or putting others down.

Leaderboard:

Also, to moderators, I wasn't entirely sure where to put this, it isn't a KSP challenge, so I put it in forum games. Hope I didn't put it in the wrong place.

Edited April 27, 2015 by Endersmens
